thread.title: Shocking moment fox hunter allegedly hit saboteur over the head with a riding crop before SPITTING at another
thread.title_full: Shocking moment fox hunter allegedly hit saboteur over the head with a riding crop before SPITTING at another

author: fallen
title: Shocking moment fox hunter allegedly hit saboteur over the head with a riding crop before SPITTING at another
text:
Opinion 'YOU JUST F***ING HIT HER!' Shocking moment fox hunter allegedly hit saboteur over the head with a riding crop before SPITTING at another 
Police arrested a man on suspicion of assault after a clash involving the Atherstone Hunt in Leics Video By FELIX ALLEN 12th February 2017, 11:10 pm SABOTEURS claim this shocking video shows the moment a hunt follower on horseback whips a woman protester with his riding crop. 
He is seen raising his hand away seconds after the alleged strike as the cowering woman shrieks and covers her head with her hands. Dave Rudge Hunt saboteurs posted a video they claim shows a rider assaulting a female protester Dave Rudge The woman cowers over a wall seconds after she was allegedly struck on top of her head with a riding crop Dave Rudge 4 Protesters said the woman was treated for her wound in hospital 
The man then says: “What? I’ve done nothing. Look it’s f***ing dangerous here, you idiot.” 
Another sab filming the clash can be heard saying: “You f***ers. You just f***ing hit her over the head.” 
Pictures released by the protest group appear to show a bloody wound to the top of the woman’s head. 
They said doctors glued the wound in hospital. Dave Rudge 4 The man denies doing anything wrong and yells at sabs ‘it’s f***ing dangerous here, you idiot’ 
A second clip said to be of the same man later shows him spitting towards the camera as he sits in the cab of a lorry. 
A man filming him asks: “How do you feel about what you’ve done today?” 
He leans out of the cab and appears to shout: “It’s police harassment. Get that camera off me. Come on, you f***ing idiot. Get it off, you f***ing gay c***.” 
He then calls towards a policeman saying: “Officer are you watching this?” before spitting towards the camera again. RELATED STORIES Dramatic photos show huge fire engulfing Manchester church with flames seen for miles across city BOOK WORMS Gang abseil into warehouse and nab rare books worth £2MILLION in Mission: Impossible style break-in 'Thoughts are with his family' English teacher, 28, dies in middle of amateur footie match in Yorkshire NAUGHTY BUT NURSE We reveal a nurse at a top hospital is an ex-porn star who starred in 23 X-rated films during his training 'burn in hell you evil b****' Anti-EU Rev suspended over foul hate mail branding Remainer Tony MP Anna Soubry a 'traitor' 'a brutal bully' Foreign thug let into UK after being jailed for robbery locked up for raping and punching woman the sun says Brexit will mean nothing unless the UK's Border Force begins to buck its ideas up WHAT A SHAM! Labour law chief hails 'very good work' of tank-chasing lawyer Phil Shiner days after he's struck off WHOA THERE Boozy racegoers limited to buying four drinks at a time in clampdown on bad behaviour at Cheltenham Festival WHITEHALL WASTE Government gaffes stack up colossal £5.5.bn bill for failed projects, cancelled flights and compo SPICE BEHIND BARS Haul of 2.5kg of toxic drug 'Spice' seized INSIDE one of our biggest prisons 'putting guards at risk' last orders? Pubs and restaurants will disappear from high streets unless business rates are cut, chain bosses warn 
West Midlands Hunt Saboteurs posted the footage on Facebook of a clash they say occurred with members if the Atherstone Hunt in Shackerstone, Leics, yesterday. 
Leicestershire Police confirmed a man was arrested on suspicion of causing actual bodily harm. 
A force spokeswoman told MailOnline: “One man has been arrested on suspicion of ABH following a report of an assault which is alleged to have happened in Derby Road, Shackerstone, on February 11. 
“He has been bailed pending further enquiries.” 
In October another member of the Atherstone Hunt was filmed apparently attacking a demonstrator while wielding a whip . 
Anti-hunt protesters were pelted with eggs and poo at the Hunt’s New Year’s meet in Atherstone, Warks.
